episodes.title: Kingdom Hall Cash Grab and Interest Charging - Why?
episodes.description: In this video you'll learn that most Witnesses have no idea that their donations are paying for lawsuits where pedophiles were covered up, you'll see secrets they are not being told and how for decades members paid interest on loans...unscripturally. Why is money constantly being begged for when so many of their Kingdom Halls are being sold? These answers and more :)

episodes.description: This video will help to answer: Who is the Governing Body? Who appointed them? Is there one in the Bible? What purpose do they serve?  What is the evidence that they claim? and more :)
